item.title: Against 'Smart' Clipboard Adjustments
item.description: Don't touch my clipboard [Alex Ellis] Complaint: Alex selected & copied an em dash ( - ) character from https://www.thepunctuationguide.com/em-dash.html, but here's what the site put into the clipboard []: — From https://www.thepunctuationguide.com/em-dash.html © 2020 thepunctuationguide.com There's a tradeoff between attribution and changing things outside a site's scope []. Apple's iBooks does this too. It may be due to contractual agreements with publishers. [] As a Security Vulnerability (Pastejacking) [] Appending extra information can be used as an attack vector.
